articles.title: ICC World Cup 2023 Schedule: India To Begin Campaign Against Australia On October 08 - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India's full schedule at ICC ODI World Cup 2023: Rohit Sharma's men begin the tournament against Australia on October 08 in Chennai, with the Pakistan match scheduled on October 15 in Ahmedabad.
articles.content: Hosts India have their priorities defined after the International Cricket Council announced the schedule for the ODI World Cup 2023 on Tuesday in Mumbai. The tournament will begin with the England vs… [+2121 chars]

articles.author: Sergio Prostak
articles.title: Marine Biologists Discover Three New Species of Carnivorous Sponges - Sci.News
articles.description: Scientists from Queensland Museum have described three new species of carnivorous demosponges from the Great Barrier Reef, in Queensland, Australia.
articles.content:
Scientists from Queensland Museum have described three new species of carnivorous demosponges from the Great Barrier Reef, in Queensland, Australia.
